title: My first FP using a grid
content:
[GRID FONTPLAY](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105140112/http:/www.fontplay.com/images2/nok.jpg)

I have to admit I liked doing it that way. Font used is a new Typotheticals set called Nok, by Graham Meade (not for sale yet, just testing). I took the photo inside the Queen Mary in Long Beach.
author: fontplayer
